tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Shilpa is one such doctor who gives you immense confidence when something is not right. Our son was down with bacterial infection and we started consulting her when infection was at peak, she not only suggested the correct medication when we had to admit our son to kinder hospital  but supported us mentally beyond expectations. Her treatment helped our son to recover from rare bacteria is less than 3 days. She is one such person who never forced us to be in hospital unlike many other doctors. She is more of a friend now than a doctor to us.
No review can justify what she did for us and me and my entire family will always be highly grateful to her.

review: One of the best doctor so far I‚Äôve consulted. She is more like a friend rather than a doctor. She is so kind, friendly, ************** always available on call/WhatsApp to help you. She will get the time for you if there is urgency and always avoid for extra medication e.g. antibiotics until and unless highly required. I‚Äôve visited her in Kinder hospital whitefield, which is also very good in terms of service, staff, ambience, cleanliness and fee as well. I highly recommend her for your next consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr Shilpa for consulting for my 23 months old's viral fever. He had caught a severe one just 4-5 months back, so we were taking extra precaution this time. After listening to the fever pattern and looking at kid's current state, she suggested to continue with the home medication and observe for next 2 days. She comforted us by suggesting to take similar approach in future and not worry if there are no major signs of illness apart from fever. She is the first doctor I ve ever consulted who suggested that such viral fevers do not even need her involvement and usually go on their own. I liked her methodical approach, patience in listening to the problem *** ******** ********** ****** ********** ********** My kid was also very comfortable with her and kept engaged in toys she gave him. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My Son had very high fever nearly 102-104 persistently and dry cough and was not controlled for couple of days. We consulted Dr. Shilpa Pandya and she had provided great care to my Kid like a family. She explained to Kid and to us very well about his diagnosis. She is available over on phone for any emergency or clarification. We really impressed with her patience and good care of Kid and it was necessary to take blood test for my kid and she came by herself to blood test room and gave confidence to my kid and took care of his fear. 
With all her good care and treatment he is doing well. Highly recommended doctor for Kids. Thank you !! üôè

review: From the moment we met Dr. Shilpa Pandya, she put us at ease with her calm and reassuring demeanor. She took the time to listen to our daughter‚Äôs concerns and answered all of our questions in detail, making sure we understood everything. What impressed us the most about Dr. Shilpa was her caring and compassionate approach towards our daughter. She was patient and gentle with her, making sure she felt comfortable and at ease not just during her vaccinations but also when she was suffering with flu. She took the time to explain things in a way that our 2.5 year old daughter could understand, which helped to alleviate her fears and anxieties. Overall, we cannot recommend Dr. Shilpa Pandya highly enough. She is an outstanding pediatrician who goes above and beyond for her patients. If you are looking for a compassionate, *************, and caring pediatrician for your child, then look no further than Dr. Shilpa.
